text:
e="preserve">Datuk Mohammed Bakar (or Mohamad Bakar) (25 June 1945 – 8 November 2020) was a Malaysian footballer. He was born in Bagan Ajam. From 1965 to 1977, he played for Penang FA. From 1970 to 1975, he played for the national team. From 1985 to 1986, he managed the national team.
Bakar died on 8 November 2020 at a hospital in Kuala Lumpur from bone marrow failure, aged 75.
